titles: The shepheards farewell to his beloved flocke of S.B.E.L. where he hath been above twenty yeeres their weake, yet vigilant pastour, / I.G. D.D.
author: Grant, John, d. 1653.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: I.G. expanded to I. G"rant. behind the Exchange"; "feb 24th"; the 5 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
